descriptionHtml:
These are Shawkab's works updated for Skyrim 1.9 and cleaned with TES5Edit.  I will be fixing and repairing most of his files.

[size=5][color=#FFA500]All versions are made with 1.9.32 of the CK therefore the mods are only supported with 1.9.32 of Skyrim. You are welcome to try Version 1.8.151 or higher but I don't support earlier versions of Skyrim.[/color][/size]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/3192]Riftrun[/url] -- by Shawkab
[color=#FF0000]Hosted with permission from author.[/color]
[color=#FFA500]Remove all items from the Breezehome before installing.[/color]
[color=#00FFFF]
Riftrun V2.0!
- This is a complete Remodel of the Breezehome
- Completely made from Scratch using the old version as a reference
- Added an Enchanting Station when you buy the Alchemy Lab.
- When buying a Childs room The Alchemy and Enchanting Stations are moved upstairs.
[/color]
[color=#FFA500]Compatibility:[/color]

Not compatible with other mods that alter the Breezehome.  However, this is compatible with the Dovahkiin Hideouts.

[color=#FFA500]Shawkab's mods I have updated:[/color]

[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59521]Breezehome Basement Continued[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43593]Dovahkiin Hideout Continued[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59524]Dovahkiin Hideout Continued - Compact Edition[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61129]Dovahkiin Keep[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59522]Dovahkiin Retreat Continued[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59531]Riftrun Continued[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61179]Razorshade Sanctuary Continued[/url]
author: Sharlikran
